tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Payal is a good doctor who listens to the problems very patiently. We have always been very happy with her way of caring treatment.  From consultation itself she was the one who guided all way to have healthy pregnancy. The best part is she remembers the history of the case and gives the best treatment. This shows her warm and gentle side and we feel, she is just not a doctor but a doctor with a difference. We feel blessed that we know such a doctor who can fix everything üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Payal Mahapatra provided outstanding care during my wife's pregnancy. From our first appointment, her expertise and reassuring demeanor put us at ease. Dr. Payal thoroughly explained each stage, answered our questions, and addressed our concerns with patience and clarity. Her warm, empathetic, and genuinely caring nature made us feel heard and valued. Her personalized approach greatly enhanced our experience, making us feel like we were always in the best hands. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Payal Mahapatra to any expectant mother seeking an exceptional obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been consulting Dr.Payal madam from past 4 months for my PCOD related issues. In my opinion ,she is a very good doctor and she really cares for her patient . She listens to my concerns and advised accordingly.I strongly recommend to consult with dr.Payal in Bangalore. Staff in the hospital is also very good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went for stomach cramps issue. The staff is very unhelpful. Firstly, they called me up and said that doctor would be late and delayed our appointment by an hour. And still we had to wait for an hour (for doctor to come)

Secondly, i was asked to share follow up reports at some whatsapp number. I was not diagnosed with the actual issue yet and still the staff did not forward my reports and kept cutting my call. The staff tried to diagnose my report themselves without asking the doctor. We ultimately had to consult someone else to get to actual issue. 

Also, they say that we will receive invoices via whatsapp, but we don‚Äôt. *** **** ** **** *** ******* **** ********* ** **** *** ******* *** ***** **** *** 

The experience is totally unsatisfactory and i will definitely not recommend going there.

review: Dr Payal Mahapatra is best for treating PCOD/PCOS and pregnancy. She really gives genuine advise .I have PCOD and trying to conceive from last 2 years it was not working.But after her consultation  medication and self improvement with food habits I conceived . Really worth visiting who are really trying to be mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would like to share my good experience with Neo Fertility clinic where I have consulted for my pcod issues.  I met Dr. Payal Mahapatra and consulted her.  Her guidance and medications was fair enough and got recovered completely. I was panic initially but doctor made me more comfortable and well explained. I have travelled far other clinics and left without results. But, honestly Dr. Payal is the best gynaecologist and would strongly recommend her.  Suggest to visit her. Thanks .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I wanted to express my appreciation for the excellent care you have provided me with. Your professionalism, knowledge, and empathy have been incredibly helpful during my visits.

I'm grateful for the time you took to answer my questions and provide detailed explanations, which helped alleviate any concerns or fears I had. Your kind and reassuring bedside manner made me feel at ease during my appointments.

I also want to thank you for always being accessible whenever I needed you, whether for routine check-ups or urgent medical issues. Your dedication and commitment to your patients are truly commendable.

Once again, thank you for all that you do. I consider myself fortunate to have you as my gynecologist

Best regards,
Shivani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Payal because I had irregular periods. She listens to the concerns very carefully. I had put on a lot of weight during the pandemic. She was not judgemental at all. She tried to understand the reason for weight gain and explained to me how weight gain causes irregular periods. And irregular periods in turn could affect hormones and result in weight gain. Instead of dumping lifelong medicines, she adviced me a healthy diet and regular exercise.  She prescribed medinices only to help me get my periods soon. My periods have become regular now.All the tests are conducted at the clinic itself.  Once results are available, we can share on a WhatsApp number and they get back really soon with the doctor's response. I truly appreciate Payal ma'am and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We would strongly recommend Dr Payal Mahapatra if you are facing any fertility issues . Thanks a ton to Dr. Payal üôè No Words are enough to appreciate the happiness that you brought in our life. We are very happy with Dr Payal since we have already gone through multiple IVF cycle under driftnet Dr and consulted too many Dr for this issue. We got to know about this hospital through online. She has initiated the treatment in a very right way without any failure. Best thing is that she goes through the history of the patient in very detail to understand it very well. ****** *** * *** *** ************ ** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ** **** ***** *** her experience and work speaks for itself. An absolutely brilliant doctor who knows exactly what she is doing. Within few months of visit, I can see a positive result. Her follow ups are extremely thorough and she is always ready to answer all your queries very politely. I am blessed to have found out about her.A very big thanks to Dr. Payal and all the other staff and the entire team!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited doctor for my mom. After listening to her case history, doctor asked her to get some tests done in her clinic. After getting the test reports, she suggested some follow up tests including biopsies; this went on for a couple of times and everytime the test procedure became more and more painful for her. A week after when we visited her for consultation on the previous test reports, she mentioned that she has no access to those reports(even when all the test were done in her clinic) and asked me to show those reports in my phone. She even tried to pressurize her to repeat the same test with anaesthesia done as the last sample was not adequate. Besides, she shouted on both of us for not taking the medicines (including antibiotic and painkillers) she prescribed earlier even after we repeatedly told her that we prefer not to take any medicine unless it's urgent and my mom experienced side-effects from those medicines earlier. To our surprise, her assistant asked us to pay consultation fee (600 Rs) as soon as we left doctor's room even when it was clearly mentioned by the same  person on the previous day that the doctor doesn't change anything for checking reports if we visit her in person within 7 days.
reply_text:
I am so disheartened to read all this‚Ä¶
You just visited me once and i suggested and did all the required test on the same day and asked to meet me with all the reports. Inspite of all the difficulties i did her biopsy on the same first visit. 
You should be generous enough to be thankful.

review:
Highly unprofessional clinic and doctor
Won‚Äôt recommend anyone to visit 
At the time of appointment they will call multiple times but after the visit for the followup they did not are even concern

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
We had to wait a long time at the already booked slot. During consultation, she again made us wait to meet another patient in between! She asked us to take a number of tests and now she is not even available to check the reports. The clinic has been super unprofessional, they charged us hefty but didn‚Äôt give reports on time (even after following up multiple times) and are now not even attending the call or sharing the report with the doctor. 
The clinic says the doctor is not available for a week so we can come and visit after that, so that they can charge us again
reply_text: We are sorry for keeping you waiting. It was hardly 20 minutes delay from our side. For doctors, emergency situations has to be taken care of first , which cannot be avoided at times. We have called you back and has explained you about your test results and apologised for d situation. You can call and  visit us and we don‚Äôt charge for first follow up visit.
